tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE clothing_production (
  design_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  design_name VARCHAR(255),
  designer_name VARCHAR(255),
  fabric_type VARCHAR(100),
  manufacturing_process VARCHAR(100),
  production_status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE manufacturing (
    manufacturing_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    design_id INT NOT NULL,
    manufacturing_date DATE NOT NULL,
    manufacturer TEXT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (design_id) REFERENCES design(design_id)
);

CREATE TABLE manufacturing_process (
    process_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    manufacturing_date DATE,
    manufacturing_stage TEXT NOT NULL,
    fabric_id INT REFERENCES fabric_inventory(fabric_id),
    design_id INT REFERENCES clothing_design(design_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Production (
    production_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    design_id INT REFERENCES Design(design_id),
    material_id INT REFERENCES Material(material_id),
    production_date DATE,
    production_quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE Sample (
    sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    design_id INT NOT NULL,
    material_id INT NOT NULL,
    pattern_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (design_id) REFERENCES Design(design_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES Material(material_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (pattern_id) REFERENCES Pattern(pattern_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Production (
    production_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_id INT NOT NULL,
    production_date DATE NOT NULL,
    production_quantity INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (sample_id) REFERENCES Sample(sample_id)
);
